name: VARIABLO
description:
A short roguelike made in 2.5 days, created for the 7DRL Challenge 2014. Programming and art by Friedrich Hanisch, Music by Ludeus Eden.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD or ArrowKeys
  • Move Underground: Hold shift + WASD/ArrowKeys
  • Wait/Pickup: Space/Return
  • Mute Music: M
  • Restart: R

Standalone downloads:

  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux
